Alias Info: if Alias-ID is set, the data will be logged as this ID in database
All data will be dropped. Are you sure?
De-bounce interval(ms): Only logs the value if it stays unchanged for X ms
Definition of common tags: Definition of common tags for metadata information.
Disable charting optimized logging of sk: Disable charting optimized logging of skipped values
Enable enhanced debug logs for the datap: Enable enhanced debug logs for the datapoint
Enter a number or leave the field empty: Enter a number or leave the field empty to not limit the recorded values
Log the last value again on startup: Log the last value again on startup
Lowering the retention period should be: Lowering the retention period should be considered with caution: Past data exceeding the retention period will be lost.
Number of days to keep the data.
This feature can only be used on databas: This feature can only be used on databases that are empty, or already were setup with this feature enabled. Otherwise it will cause errors (see logs).
Use tags to store metadata information,: Use tags to store metadata information, instead of fields
blockTime: Ignore all new values for X ms after last logged value
common-tags help: Tags defined here can be used for custom config on single objects.
custom-tags help: If custom tags are defined, this data will be additionally saved.
debounce: Ignore changes till value stays unchanged for X Milliseconds
health-check help: Regular health checks probes are sent to the DB server to check if it is still alive.
note: History settings must be done for every state individually on the tab "States" and only if adapter is active
only enter when e.g. a reverse proxy is: only enter when a reverse proxy or such is used
use 0 to not buffer at all: Use 0 to not buffer at all
usetags help: For more information, please refer to the documentation: https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.influxdb/blob/master/README.md#Store-metadata-information-as-tags-instead-of-fields
